wikipedia_page.main: Martin Freeth (1944-2021) was a filmmaker for the British Broadcasting Corporation.

response: The BBC Multimedia Centre was a team led by Martin Freeth to introduce new media across the corporation.
Andrew married Roseen (née Preston). They had three sons, Martin Freeth, Tony Freeth, and Richard Freeth. Andrew's nephew is Peter Freeth, also a Royal Academician.
*Martin Freeth, 76, British filmmaker, cancer.Martin Freeth obituary
